<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataBL extends data { const CODE = 'BL'; const PREFIX = 590; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:590|69\d|976)\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '590(?:2[7-9]|5[12]|87)\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '69(?:0\d\d|1(?:2[29]|3[0-5]))\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '976[01]\d{5}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array(); }
